content: a m i g u r u m i b e e p a t t e r n super bulky yarn ssiimmppllyy ppddffss simplypdfs is a place where you can find joy for amigurumi plushies many different cute free and paid patterns for the ones that love to crochet the most get your hooks and yarns and let s get started shall we ^^ p a g e i n s t r u c t i o n s materials terms technique chunky yarn in yellow st stitch this toy is crocheted in spiral black and white chain chain where you don t join the fuzzy pink yarn for cheeks magic_ring magic_ring rounds hook size 6mm single_crochet single_crochet yarn needle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet scissors flo front loop only stuffing like poly fill blo -back loop only safety eyes 14 mm wide increase increase 2 single_crochet in same stitch decrease decrease 2 single_crochet together each round is marked with st count at the end body wings in yellow in white 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 6 increase 12 2 6 increase 12 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 make 2 wings 5 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 leave a tail for sewing 6 4 single_crochet increase x 6 36 7-9 36 single_crochet /put eyes between row 4-5/ change to black 10-11 36 single_crochet assembling change to yellow 12-13 36 single_crochet cheeks embroider 2 stiches wide change to black below eyes 14-15 36 single_crochet sew wings between 10-14 change to yellow 16 36 single_crochet 17 4 single_crochet decrease x 6 30 18 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 24 19 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 20 1 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 21 6 decrease make sure u have fun and add details as you like
